hero.title: Two plans to elevate your brand month by month.
hero.intro: Choose between a plan focused on social media content or a more complete plan to take care of your digital presence. If your brand needs something different, we build it to measure.

plan1.title: Monthly Content Kit
plan1.body:
For brands that want consistency on social with an editorial standard.
What it includes: monthly concept + plan, production by scope, social-first editing, and delivery of publish-ready pieces + an asset library useful for social and website.
Ideal if: you have an internal publishing team or need ready deliverables without full channel operation.

plan2.title: Digital Brand Maintenance
plan2.body:
For brands that want to elevate the standard of everything seen in digital with an ongoing partner.
What it includes: monthly social content + social media management + continuous optimisation of the digital ecosystem (website/landings/blog/newsletter/campaigns) so everything feels coherent and intentional.
Ideal if: you need complete operation, content + social + integrated digital presence.

bespoke.title: Bespoke Projects
bespoke.body:
For openings, relaunches, key seasons, or specific needs.

What it includes: we define scope, deliverables and timing with you, and execute with the same editorial standard and methodology.

methodology.title: Sassy Methodology
methodology.body:
We work with a careful process so that every piece and every touchpoint speaks the same brand language.

We align intention, audience and standard; produce with precision; edit social-first with clear direction; and deliver a consistent system: visual coherence, narrative and execution, month by month.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our luxury hospitality content services

items.question: What services does Sassy Studio offer?
items.answer: We offer three main services: Visual Alchemy (high-resolution hotel and gastronomy photography), Digital Narratives (strategic Reels and TikTok production), and Identity Refinement (brand positioning for the exclusive hospitality market).

items.question: What geographic area do you operate in?
items.answer: We primarily operate in Mexico City (CDMX), serving boutique hotels, luxury restaurants, and lifestyle brands throughout the region.

items.question: How long does a typical project take?
items.answer: Timelines vary based on project scope. A typical photography session can be completed in 1-2 days, while full brand campaigns may take 4-8 weeks. Contact us for a personalized consultation.

items.question: Do you work with brands outside the hospitality industry?
items.answer: While we specialize in boutique hospitality, we also work with premium lifestyle brands that share our vision for luxury content and strategic refinement.

items.question: How can I request a consultation?
items.answer: You can contact us through our website contact form or email us at contacto@sassystudio.com.mx. We'll respond within 24-48 hours to schedule an initial consultation.
